Bookmarklets

Collecting useful bookmarklets around the web. Curated by Sacha Schmid.

Read the instructions|Suggest a bookmarklet

    Bookmarklets can be extremely useful, but often you don't take enough time to look for them properly. That's why I decided to list some of the most useful ones on one handy page for you to collect and use. Go ahead, browse through the list and tap and hold on whatever bookmarklet you want to copy itdrag whatever you want to the bookmark bar.

    After adding this page as a bookmark, go to its edit screen, paste the copied URL and remove everything from the URL before 'javascript:'.
